content: In terms of the revenue breakdown by segment, Q2 '22 revenues of the satellite network segment, which provides advanced broadband satellite communication networks and associated professional services, turnkey solutions and managed services in the cellular backhaul, enterprise IFC and defense markets were $26.9 million compared to $34.4 million in the same quarter last year. Q2 '22 revenues of the Integrated Solutions segment which provides equipment, product systems and solutions for the mission-critical defense broadcast advanced on-the-move and on-the-port satellite communication solutions, including for airborne and ground mobile were $15.7 million compared to $12.1 million in the same quarter last year.
